title: CTA Person Schema
description: A schema to add individual members of the Collaborative Technology Alliance to the Murmurations Index

primary_url.title: Primary URL
primary_url.description: The unique and definitive website address for the person (e.g., alice.org or some-host.org/alice)

name.title: Full Name
name.description: The full name of the person

description.title: Description/Bio
description.description: A short description or biography of the person

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Keywords that describe the person, searchable in the Murmurations index

image.title: Photo
image.description: A photo or other image of the person (preferably a square image)

knows_language.title: Languages Spoken
knows_language.description: The languages a person can read, write and speak

email.title: Contact Email
email.description: An email address at which to contact the person

geographic_scope.title: Geographic Scope
geographic_scope.description: The geographic scope of the group's activities

schema.name: cta_person-v0.1.0
schema.purpose: The person schema for members of the Collaborative Technology Alliance
